articles.title: Transfer news LIVE! Mount to Man United; Arsenal get Gundogan boost; Chelsea to sign Ugarte; Kovacic latest - Evening Standard
articles.description: The latest news, gossip and rumours ahead of the summer transfer window
articles.content:
Tielemans confirms Leicester exit
Youri Tielemans has confirmed he is leaving Leicester after more than four years at the club.
The midfielder is out of contract this summer and his departure comes… [+683 chars]

articles.author: Katya Witney
articles.title: Explained: Why England have picked newbie Josh Tongue over Lord’s master Chris Woakes for the Ireland Test - Wisden
articles.description: England have picked uncapped seamer Josh Tongue for the first Test of the summer at Lord's which starts tomorrow (June 1), with Chris Woakes left out of the starting XI for the pre-Ashes clash.
articles.content:
